file_content.text: These stasis chambers are scheduled to be purged. Preparing emergency fire-cleansing system.
Caution. New guidelines have been authorized by Commander Geland.
Be warned yourself: there's a man who wants your "savants" dead.
You're all in danger.
No! Break the wall! They follow my steps, they... they....
They are ash and air. My... grasp fails, and I fall.
Alive again. This air is sweet, to stand is a dance. But--who are you, stranger?
My strength is a ripple, but a savant's is a great wave. They see the future, move without touch, and enemies are dust before them.
Be warned, I am the blade of these savants. My patriarch, Hallow Voice, had my word.
I don't know what you mean by "savants."
Savants?
But their minds are glass, newborn. So they walk in my footsteps... and I am their blade.
I am a Jedi Master. I'm no threat to you or your people.
It's alright, I'm a Jedi.
"Jedi"? Stranger, your name cannot speak.
You war with threats and I will not battle.
Hush, everyone--play "quiet stone." I sense lies.
Listen to me: If your savants stay here, they'll be burned to death.
Order them out of there.
Your words tremble and storm. If this is true--go, play "chase" with the stranger!
Hallow Voice trusts you with these "savants." You can't take chances with their lives.
Save them!
I cannot take chances; a patriarch's seed grows in your voice. All, quickly, play "chase" with the stranger!
By Hallow Voice! Your words rang clear.
I am Sharpest Eye. You snatched us from the abyss.
You'll just stand there while the real enemy burns your savants alive?
Don't be stupid.
You, play "frozen." If she lies, she will be blood and shreds.
You, play "frozen." If the stranger lies, he will be blood and shreds.
I am Sharpest Eye, now a broken blade. Your words rang clear, but not in me.
Leaders must make choices, and sometimes they're wrong.
You made a command decision.
You have to start listening, you're no use to me dead.
Don't let it happen again.
If you seek revenge, I can lead you to the man responsible.
It was Geland's fault.
What path do you walk, stranger?
I've come to free your leader, if I can find him....
I'm looking for Hallow Voice.
It's time you were freed from your long imprisonment....
I came to rescue you.
I want you and Hallow Voice to help me fight a great war....
I need an army.
Jedi, Empire, Republic.... Only Hallow Voice could swim this ocean.
I am empty of where he is, but my brother warriors may be full. They are locked in blackness close by.
Tell them you echo Hallow Voice, as he echoed Broken Scar. They will help you--I have a different path.
I appreciate the help, but I don't know what that means.
Echo? Broken Scar?
I would nurture your mind's desert, but there is no time.
I'll tell them. Thank you.
I believe I understand.
If those things are Force sensitive, I might have a use for them.
Leave your savants with me.
Unwise. A savant is easily cracked by fear, and thundering violence escapes.
Other savants are locked in blackness. When they are enlightened, I will hunt Hallow Voice. Walk carefully.
I am Sharpest Eye. Here. A patriarch's seed should be nurtured.
